[[inst_prf]]
==== PRF

*Syntax:* prf [SrcL, SrcR<{.sw,.uw}><<<shamt>]

*Description:* Load/store instruction with LDA/BASE_REG addressing mode.

*Encoding:*

image::../generated/encodings/enc_prf.svg[PRF encoding,width=800]

*Group:* LDA/BASE_REG
